mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_num, id, pass, koname, engname, gender, birth, tel ,email, passport, nation) values (#{mem_num}, #{id}, #{pass}, #{koname}, #{engname}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{passport}, #{nation})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
update member set koname=#{koname}, engname=#{engname}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, passport=#{passport}, nation=#{nation} where id=#{id}
select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
